name: Mindbender (itch)
description:
Mindbender is a first-person puzzle game where the level changes as you progress, making it a rather complex task to find the exit. You might not even be alone either...

Features

  • 11 levels in the current build: It should take you some time to complete that.
  • Changing levels as you play: "Wait, this hallway wasn't here just then" or "I should be at the beginning, but I honestly don't know now" aren't uncommon thoughts while playing.
  • Many updates to come: I'm not nearly done building. I have a lot of ideas for many more levels and challenges.

If you like this and want more, please click here for more of my games.
